short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SuperRenter management extension to display within the Resman interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SuperRenter + Resman Chrome Extension allows users of Resman to easily manage their resident inbox for SuperRenter within the same interface. Just install the extension, and then visit your Resman site to see the blue tab on the left. Logging in with your SuperRenter credentials will give you inbox access along with push notifications to your browser and within the Resman experience.
